ComicInfo.Summary:
Get into the groove...the bad groove! Terror meets his grooviest villain yet in this back flashin’, fist smashin’, non-stop action trip through the life of a criminal and back again, with justice being served left and right! Get in the groove... the BAD GROOVE!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Rahzzah | 1 | B | Cover B | Jorge Fornés | 2 | C | Cover C | Brian Level | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Brian Level | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Fornés | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Brian Level | 6 | G/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Rahzzah | 7 | H/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Fornés | 8 |
